None.Name: Remove Magic
None.Description: Immediately removes all buffs from a hostile or all debuffs from a friendly unit. Will also revert all status effects like Freeze or Paralyze when casted on a friendly unit. Hostile units will be insensitive to all major buffs for 10 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
